hive_lesson.title: 1230 New Gym
hive_lesson.description: Rebecca gets info about the new gym.

hive_text_custom.text: Hey, Todd, I'm going and looking for a gym. Actually, I hear you've joined a gym. Which one?
gym down town. It just opened about a month ago. Maybe two months ago. It's really nice.
OK, what's the name of it?
Yeah, so, and it's pretty much has everything. I mean it has, you know, free weights, of course and it has all the latest machines.
Actually some of the machines are kind of
, I really don't know how they work yet. I'll have to ask the staff.
a treadmill? It's a whole big machine that you don't know how what to do?
Exactly. I'm actually afraid to get on the thing. I don't want to break it, you know.
Is there people that can help you?

Yeah, actually, that's part of the problem is that you can't use any of the equipment unless you get trained for it. They're really specific, so you have to have guidance. It's kind of annoying actually because, you know, everything... they have a system and they know based on, you know, your membership what machines you can use and what you can't.
OK. But what happens if, like I've been to a gym before do I still need to get the training before I start?
Yeah. That's how I was. I told them that I, you know, had been lifting weights for awhile and they didn't care, so you have to
to use all the equipment. It's kind of inconvenient.
OK, so, do they have classes though?
They do. Actually, they pretty much have everything. They have yoga, kick boxing, spin classes, dancing, so the schedule looks pretty diverse.
Oh, that's good. I do prefer classes than the weights.

Only one thing that's bad about the classes though is that cause it's new, and it's a new gym and there's lots of people and it looks like it's pretty crowded in there, I think you have to reserve what classes you're going to join.
Oh, geez, I usually just like to walk in.
Yeah, when you feel like going to the gym, you go.

Right, right. One thing that is nice though is they have an actual gym floor, like a basketball gym, so you can play basketball. They have volleyball tournaments, so I mean, if you like more traditional sport, like tennis, they also have tennis courts. You can do that as well.
Oh, that's good. I do like tennis. I love tennis actually.
Well, actually, if you're interested I'd be glad to take you
to the gym and show you. I think you get a free trial workout.
OH, that's good. That's good. So how much would it cost per month?
Well, cause it's new it's kind of expensive. It costs about fifty dollars a month.
Yeah, but if you buy a membership, a two-year membership, you can get a two year membership, I think for eight hundred dollars, so it saves you some money so it's kind of reasonable.
And I suppose if you pay for two, you know you have to go then.
Right. Right. It's eight hundred dollars for two years, five hundred dollars for one year, or fifty dollars a month.
Oh, one thing that's really cool too is that they have a social center. They have like an area where you can get like fruit drinks and coffee and stuff like that and just hang out. It's quite nice.
That's good. So after the workout, go and have coffee.
Lovely. OK. So, yeah, I would love to come and have a look at it.
OK, well next week, anytime, just give me a call. I'll take you there.

hive_lesson_quiz.question: 3) He says you can take _____ classes
5) How much is a two-year membership?
6) What can you do in the social center?

hive_text_custom.text: just a computer. It is also my main music player.
to the stop if you like.
